title: Simple Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: ["2 eggs", "1 tbsp butter", "salt to taste", "pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Crack eggs into bowl", "Add salt and pepper", "Heat butter in pan", "Pour eggs into pan", "Stir gently until set"]

title: Basic Pasta Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb pasta", "1 cup cherry tomatoes", "1/2 cup olives", "1/4 cup olive oil", "2 tbsp vinegar", "salt", "pepper"]
directions: ["Cook pasta according to package directions", "Drain and cool", "Halve cherry tomatoes", "Mix olive oil and vinegar", "Combine all ingredients", "Season with salt and pepper"]

title: Grilled Chicken Breast
ingredients: ["4 chicken breasts", "2 tbsp olive oil", "1 tsp garlic powder", "1 tsp paprika", "salt", "pepper"]
directions: ["Preheat grill to medium-high", "Season chicken with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper", "Brush with olive oil", "Grill 6-7 minutes per side", "Check internal temperature reaches 165°F", "Rest 5 minutes before serving"]

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: ["2 cups mixed vegetables", "2 tbsp soy sauce", "1 tbsp vegetable oil", "1 tsp ginger", "2 cloves garlic", "1 tsp sesame oil"]
directions: ["Heat vegetable oil in wok or large pan", "Add minced garlic and ginger", "Stir fry for 30 seconds", "Add vegetables", "Stir fry 3-4 minutes", "Add soy sauce and sesame oil", "Toss and serve immediately"]

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 1/4 cups flour", "1 tsp baking soda", "1 cup butter", "3/4 cup sugar", "3/4 cup brown sugar", "2 eggs", "2 tsp vanilla", "2 cups chocolate chips"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 375°F", "Mix flour and baking soda", "Cream butter and sugars", "Beat in eggs and vanilla", "Gradually add flour mixture", "Stir in chocolate chips", "Drop onto baking sheets", "Bake 9-11 minutes"]
